verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H6030><s%> <S%H559><s%> to Job, <S%H347><s%>
"Will the faultfinder <S%H3250><s%> contend <S%H7378><s%> with the Almighty <S%H7706><s%>? Let him who reproves <S%H3198><s%> God <S%H433><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> it."
Then Job <S%H347><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%>
"Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I am insignificant; <S%H7043><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> can I reply <S%H7725><s%> to Thee? I lay <S%H7760><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> on my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
"Once <S%H259><s%> I have spoken, <S%H1696><s%> and I will not answer; <S%H6030><s%> Even twice, <S%H8147><s%> and I will add <S%H3254><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more."
Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Job <S%H347><s%> out of the storm, <S%H9370><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%>
"Now <S%H4994><s%> gird <S%H247><s%> up your loins <S%H2504><s%> like a man; <S%H1397><s%> I will ask <S%H7592><s%> you, and you instruct <S%H3045><s%> Me.
"Will you really <S%H637><s%> annul <S%H6565><s%> My judgment <S%H4941><s%>? Will you condemn <S%H7561><s%> Me that you may be justified <S%H6663><s%>?
"Or <S%H518><s%> do you have an arm <S%H2220><s%> like God, <S%H410><s%> And can you thunder <S%H7481><s%> with a voice <S%H6963><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> His?
"Adorn <S%H5710><s%> yourself <S%H5710><s%> with eminence <S%H1347><s%> and dignity; <S%H1363><s%> And clothe <S%H3847><s%> yourself <S%H3847><s%> with honor <S%H1935><s%> and majesty. <S%H1926><s%>

"Pour <S%H6327><s%> out the overflowings <S%H5678><s%> of your anger; <S%H639><s%> And look <S%H7200><s%> on everyone <S%H3605><s%> who <S%H1343><s%> is proud, <S%H1343><s%> and make <S%H8213><s%> him low. <S%H8213><s%>

"Look <S%H7200><s%> on everyone <S%H3605><s%> who <S%H1343><s%> is proud, <S%H1343><s%> [and] humble <S%H3665><s%> him; And tread <S%H1915><s%> down <S%H1915><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> where <S%H8478><s%> they stand. <S%H8478><s%>
"Hide <S%H2934><s%> them in the dust <S%H6083><s%> together; <S%H3162><s%> Bind <S%H2280><s%> them in the hidden <S%H2934><s%> [place.]
"Then I will also <S%H1571><s%> confess <S%H3034><s%> to you, That your own right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> can save <S%H3467><s%> you.

"Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> Behemoth, <S%H930><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I made <S%H6213><s%> as well <S%H5973><s%> as you; He eats <S%H398><s%> grass <S%H2682><s%> like an ox. <S%H1241><s%>
"Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> his strength <S%H3581><s%> in his loins, <S%H4975><s%> And his power <S%H202><s%> in the muscles <S%H8306><s%> of his belly. <S%H990><s%>
"He bends <S%H9156><s%> his tail <S%H2180><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> a cedar; <S%H730><s%> The sinews <S%H1517><s%> of his thighs <S%H6344><s%> are knit <S%H8276><s%> together. <S%H8276><s%>
"His bones <S%H6106><s%> are tubes <S%H650><s%> of bronze; <S%H5154><s%> His limbs <S%H1634><s%> are like bars <S%H4300><s%> of iron. <S%H1270><s%>
"He is the first <S%H7225><s%> of the ways <S%H1870><s%> of God; <S%H410><s%> Let his maker <S%H6213><s%> bring <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> his sword. <S%H2719><s%>

"Surely <S%H5608><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> bring <S%H5375><s%> him food, <S%H944><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H9130><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> play <S%H7832><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>
"Under <S%H8478><s%> the lotus <S%H6628><s%> plants <S%H6628><s%> he lies <S%H7901><s%> down, <S%H7901><s%> In the covert <S%H5643><s%> of the reeds <S%H7070><s%> and the marsh. <S%H1207><s%>
"The lotus <S%H6628><s%> plants <S%H6628><s%> cover <S%H5526><s%> him with shade; <S%H6738><s%> The willows <S%H6155><s%> of the brook <S%H5158><s%> surround <S%H5437><s%> him.

"If <S%H2005><s%> a river <S%H5104><s%> rages, <S%H6231><s%> he is not alarmed; <S%H2648><s%> He is confident, <S%H982><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> rushes <S%H1518><s%> to his mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
"Can anyone capture <S%H3947><s%> him when he is on watch, <S%H5869><s%> With barbs <S%H4170><s%> can anyone pierce <S%H9344><s%> [his] nose <S%H639><s%>?
